import React, { useState } from "react"; function App() { const drumSounds = [ { id: 'Heater1', letter: 'Q', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/Heater-1.mp3" }, { id: 'Heater2', letter: 'W', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/Heater-2.mp3" }, { id:'Heater3', letter:'E', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/Heater-3.mp3" }, { id:'Heater4', letter:'A', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/Heater-4_1.mp3" }, { id:'Clap', letter: 'S', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/Heater-6.mp3" }, { id: 'HH', letter: 'D', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/Dsc_Oh.mp3" }, { id: 'Kick Hat', letter:'Z', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/Kick_n_Hat.mp3"}, { id:"Kicka", letter: 'X', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/RP4_KICK_1.mp3"}, { id:'Closed', letter: 'C', src:"https://s3.amazonaws.com/freecodecamp/drums/Cev_H2.mp3"}, ] const [clip, setClip] = useState(""); const handleClick = (event) => { let clickedButton = event.target.id; drumSounds.forEach(elem => console.log(elem.id)); setClip(clickedButton); } return (

Drum Kit

{clip}
Q
W
E
A
S
D
Z
X
C
); } export default App;
